WRITING.TEXT: Same here. It's annoying
That's so wrong.

I'm so sorry for your loss. I'm new here, but hopefully you don't mind my opinion. The fact that people will get online and be hurtful to people they don't know (because....yes?) is absolutely awful. I hope you and the other mods can put it behind you and don't let those people get you down. That's just horrible. I hope you feel better soon.

I completely understand. You have to take care of yourself first. You and the other mods. People who think it's okay to hurt people for no reason should just go back to their corners and be ignored. I'm glad you're feeling a little better. Hopefully you'll be 100% soon! :)

WRITING.TITLE: Selling Lolita Goth Sleeves, Kitty Crossbag, and Nocturnal Kitty Ears
WRITING.TEXT: Lolita Goth Sleeves Kitty Crossbody Nocturnal Kitty Ears Please offer if interested
Hi, thanks for your offer, I'd do it for just the noc ears.
Hi, I'm sorry I didn't realize the heels were worth that much. No thank you. I'm hoping to sell the items for diamonds, but thank you!
How did you get so lucky? ;)
Don't worry about crazy people. I'm so sorry that happened to you. Ignore her. There are plenty of nice people who would be happy to trade with you without all the crazy.
Wow.....just wow. That is all.
Best of luck to you in everything.
I'm so sorry to hear that. No one deserves that. I hope you reported her.

WRITING.TITLE: Selling Nocturnal Kitty Ears for 30k Diamonds
WRITING.TEXT: Selling nocturnal kitty ears for 30K diamonds. Thanks for looking!
Seriously?
I #8217;m sorry that #8217;s so terrible. Hope your day has gone better!
Good! Sometimes you just have to get your mind off of things! :)
Sure! What #8217;s your username?
Sounds good. I'm PurpleLCM288. I turned on joins. just let me know whenever you're ready. Thanks again!
Hi! I'd love to Royal Rebel Boots. Would you take 26k?
Awesome! Are you on right now? I can join you. I'm PurpleLCM288.
Hi! How many diamonds would you want for the rr sleeves?
Kitty crossbody for 20k? Thanks for considering.
I am so sorry that happened. Is there anything I can do to help? I can try to email the same people too. Please let me know. You can DM if you need anything. I am so so sorry!
Hi! How many diamonds would you take for the rr sleeves?
What would you want for the Val corset? Just trying to get an idea. Thank you!
Lol. I thought you had the corset and were looking for offers. Thanks for letting me know!
Hi! Do you happen to have the rr skirt or the rr sleeves? Is so how many diamonds would you want for each? Thank you!
That sounds good to me. Would you be able to hold them for just a little bit? About to have dinner. If not, I understand. Thanks either way.
Sending you a message. :)
I can do that!
Hi! I see you've gotten some offers. If you want any of the other Halloween items just let me know. I can give you prices. Thank you!
I can do 10k for goth sleeves. :)
How many were you looking for? I #8217;m happy to help.
That #8217;s fine. I #8217;d you want DM me your username and let me know when you #8217;d like to meet up. Thank you!
Hi! I would do this for 25k. I hope your day is going well. Thank you!
PurpleLCM288 and yours? Please let me know when you would like to do the trade. Thanks!
Oh that's alright. If you want you can DM me your offer. I'd be happy to take a look!
No worries! There's no rush. Take your time. Have a great day!
Okay that works for me! Just let me know when you're heading that way! :)
Okay. I sent you a friend request. I need just a little but to finish something but I #8217;ll see you soon!

Cutsiewolf if you are really sorry and want to change one thing you could think about doing is helping the people you said you scammed get their stuff back. I've never traded you but I think it would really help the people who did trade with you and lost their stuff. In my opinion that could be one way to start to apologize.

Okay, but there are a lot of people who are still very upset with you about your actions. Maybe try to find them, reach out to them and apologize personally. Unfortunately, I've seen more than one person say that they have been scammed by you. You might be able to look through the comments but either way I'd try to find those people individually and do whatever you can to make it right. It will however be up to them whether they accept your apology so you have to be ready for their decision either way. But if you want to make it right think of starting there.

Alright, if that's the only person who you scammed, you need to find out why other people are upset. All of these people aren't mad because you scammed just one person. There has to be more. Hurtful things said? Harassment? Find out why people are angry. You won't really be able to apologize if you don't understand the reason. It will be hard, but that's okay. It will show people that you do want to change and if that's the case that's what I want for you. But please put yourself in the shoes of the people who are upset. You can do this. There are other comments down below and there are other threads of people who have spoken with you. Just start there. I think people will be more willing to give you a chance than one big apology. Final decision up to them though. Best of luck.
Hi, someone below asked before me, but if you don't get any other offers I'll take the rose corsage. :)
Okay I'm PurpleLCM288. Please add me and I can come trade. Thank you!
Yes that #8217;s fine! DM me your username and I #8217;ll add you!
Hi! I can do that for the Kitty Crossbody!
:). I #8217;m PurpleLCM288. If you add me I #8217;ll join you. Thank you!
Hmm. I #8217;ll try adding you.
I sent you a request. ;)
I would do it for the fluttering butterfly heels! :)
Hi! I'll take them.
Can I buy the mix match socks?
Thank you! PurpleLCM288.
Ok! I #8217;ll stand by the last door.
Hi, I'll offer the OG price!
Hi! I'll do that offer! My username is PurpleLCM288 :)
